job_tasks.phrase: deliver services & libraries that add value to our Search as a Service platform
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the development and delivery of software services.

job_tasks.phrase: responsible for the end-to-end delivery of these services, which includes design, security, development, testing and deployment of services & back-end components
job_tasks.justification: This enumerates core software development lifecycle activities from design to deployment.

job_tasks.phrase: delivery of services within the search domain
job_tasks.justification: Highlights the development and delivery of software services in a specific domain.

job_tasks.phrase: Write, test, review, document service-oriented applications in collaboration with onshore and offshore developers, mostly for the development of PoC's.
job_tasks.justification: Details specific software development tasks like writing, testing, reviewing, and documenting applications, including proof-of-concepts.

job_tasks.phrase: Identify potential opportunities for code optimization.
job_tasks.justification: This relates to improving the efficiency and quality of existing software code.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide input for code reviews and help with environment build deployments, release notes and build notices.
job_tasks.justification: Involves contributing to the software development process through reviews and deployment-related activities.

job_tasks.phrase: Maintain code sanity and promote & practise coding standards/practices within the team.
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on ensuring code quality and adhering to development standards.

job_tasks.phrase: Document application design and logic
job_tasks.justification: Refers to the documentation of software architecture and functionality.

job_tasks.phrase: Research, identify and recommend operational improvements resulting in improved reliability and/or efficiencies in maintaining the application.
job_tasks.justification: This involves looking at operational aspects for reliability and efficiency, leaning towards MLOps/DevOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to driving the architecture, assets and tools required to meet our current and future needs across WK
job_tasks.justification: This involves contributing to the foundational aspects of software architecture and tooling.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with team members and QA engineers to drive deeper integration of NLP, machine learning and AI technologies to enhance uptake & delivery of components.
job_tasks.justification: Indicates direct involvement with integrating and enhancing components using NLP, ML, and AI technologies.

job_tasks.phrase: Evaluate and advise on technical aspects of open work requests in the product backlog with the project lead.
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding product needs and translating them into technical evaluations.

job_tasks.phrase: interested in utilizing (and/or learning) Java and Python
job_tasks.justification: Shows a willingness to learn new programming languages.

job_tasks.phrase: opportunity to learn about technologies in the content domain
job_tasks.justification: Expresses a desire to learn new technologies.

job_tasks.phrase: learn from a mature development team
job_tasks.justification: Indicates a proactive approach to learning from experienced colleagues.

job_tasks.phrase: utilize & learn AWS technologies
job_tasks.justification: Highlights the intention to learn and use cloud technologies.

job_tasks.phrase: Continuously stay current on market trends and new technologies that can affect how we approach our solutions.
job_tasks.justification: Demonstrates a commitment to staying updated with industry advancements.

job_tasks.phrase: work hand in hand with business, product leaders, customers, and developers.
job_tasks.justification: Requires collaboration and communication with various stakeholders.

job_tasks.phrase: collaborate and help build the best practices for the development team
job_tasks.justification: Emphasizes teamwork and contributing to team processes.

job_tasks.phrase: in collaboration with onshore and offshore developers
job_tasks.justification: Indicates working together with geographically dispersed team members.

job_tasks.phrase: Evaluate and advise on technical aspects of open work requests in the product backlog
job_tasks.justification: Involves assessing and providing technical recommendations for ongoing work.

job_tasks.phrase: Research, identify and recommend operational improvements
job_tasks.justification: Requires problem identification and recommending solutions for operational efficiency.

soft_skills.phrase: interested in utilizing (and/or learning) Java and Python
opportunity to learn about technologies in the content domain
learn from a mature development team
Continuously stay current on market trends and new technologies that can affect how we approach our solutions.
work hand in hand with business, product leaders, customers, and developers.
collaborate and help build the best practices for the development team
in collaboration with onshore and offshore developers
Evaluate and advise on technical aspects of open work requests in the product backlog
Research, identify and recommend operational improvements

classification.rationale: The role emphasizes core software development tasks (TASK4) and some operational improvements (TASK5). While it mentions integrating NLP, ML, and AI technologies (TASK3), it lacks the advanced generative AI focus required for a GenAI Engineer, such as fine-tuning LLMs or RAG systems. The primary activities revolve around building and maintaining services with traditional software engineering principles.
